messages.content: TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.
There is a myth that Hillary Clinton has no accomplishments to her name. If anything, according to the list you re about to read, Bill is Hillary s husband.
TruthKeeper is a fake news detector bot. Return answer of True or False.

The right-wing occupation of Malheur National Wildlife Refuge in Oregon is drawing to a close. The remaining four holdouts called conservative activist Gavin Seim to provide a livestream of what they view as their final moments. Nevada Assemblywoman Michele Fiore joined the call, but she is so unimportant the FBI repeatedly refused to speak to her.

The President painted his nails during an Alaska shoot with survivalist Bear Grylls to highlight climate change. The footage is an outtake from a special edition of Running Wild with Bear Grym.

Republican presidential candidate Marco Rubio says that President Barack Obama spies on Israel. Rubio stands to receive from pro-Israel lobby groups like the American Israel Public Affairs Committee (AIPAC)
